greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 1 if n is of the form p^(2^k) where p is prime and k >= 0, otherwise 0.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
mathematica: a[n_] := Boole[n > 1 && Length[(f = FactorInteger[n])] == 1 && (e = f[[;; , 2]]) == 2^IntegerExponent[e, 2]]; Array[a, 100] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Nov 27 2020 *)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Apr 16 2018
